TunableList.name: GLOBAL_EXEMPT_SIM_BUFFS
TunableList.description: Set of buffs that will be added to the Sims that are considered exempt from triggering SS3. This buffs are usually autonomy modifiers so they stop doing specific behaviors due the fact that SS3 is triggered and these Sims may still try to do something (like autonomy).

Tunable.description: Buff that gets added to the Sim.

TdescFragTag.name: GLOBAL_EXEMPT_SIM_TESTS
TdescFragTag.description: Set of tests that, if passes (using single sim resolver), Sim will not attempt to push SS3, but can have SS3 interactions (and buff) pushed on them.
